ENTRY.refkeywords: images img write output io create save
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Save image data to a file

DESC.PARA: The save_image command saves a dataset to an image file. This command has no return value.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")
filename - the output filename, including path

DESC.PARA: Write dataset 1 to an image named "image.fits".
The dataset "srcimg" is written to the output image "output.fits".

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
